1732subroutine aerosol_profile_setup(aerosols, ens_size, numlevels, &
1733 aerosl_type)
1734
1735type(aerosol_profile_type), intent(inout) :: aerosols
1736integer, intent(in) :: ens_size
1737integer, intent(in) :: numlevels
1738integer, intent(in) :: aerosl_type
1739
1740character(len=512) :: string1
1741character(len=*), parameter :: routine = 'aerosol_profile_setup'
1742
1743if (aerosl_type == 1) then
1744 ! OPAC
1745 allocate(aerosols%insoluble(ens_size,numlevels))
1746 allocate(aerosols%water_soluble(ens_size,numlevels))
1747 allocate(aerosols%soot(ens_size,numlevels))
1748 allocate(aerosols%sea_salt_accum(ens_size,numlevels))
1749 allocate(aerosols%sea_salt_coarse(ens_size,numlevels))
1750 allocate(aerosols%mineral_nucleus(ens_size,numlevels))
1751 allocate(aerosols%mineral_accum(ens_size,numlevels))
1752 allocate(aerosols%mineral_coarse(ens_size,numlevels))
1753 allocate(aerosols%mineral_transport(ens_size,numlevels))
1754 allocate(aerosols%sulphated_droplets(ens_size,numlevels))
1755 allocate(aerosols%volcanic_ash(ens_size,numlevels))
1756 allocate(aerosols%new_volcanic_ash(ens_size,numlevels))
1757 allocate(aerosols%asian_dust(ens_size,numlevels))
1758
1759 aerosols%insoluble = 0.0_jprb
1760 aerosols%water_soluble = 0.0_jprb
1761 aerosols%soot = 0.0_jprb
1762 aerosols%sea_salt_accum = 0.0_jprb
1763 aerosols%sea_salt_coarse = 0.0_jprb
1764 aerosols%mineral_nucleus = 0.0_jprb
1765 aerosols%mineral_accum = 0.0_jprb
1766 aerosols%mineral_coarse = 0.0_jprb
1767 aerosols%mineral_transport = 0.0_jprb
1768 aerosols%sulphated_droplets = 0.0_jprb
1769 aerosols%volcanic_ash = 0.0_jprb
1770 aerosols%new_volcanic_ash = 0.0_jprb
1771 aerosols%asian_dust = 0.0_jprb
1772elseif (aerosl_type == 2) then
1773 ! CAMS
1774 allocate(aerosols%black_carbon(ens_size,numlevels))
1775 allocate(aerosols%dust_bin1(ens_size,numlevels))
1776 allocate(aerosols%dust_bin2(ens_size,numlevels))
1777 allocate(aerosols%dust_bin3(ens_size,numlevels))
1778 allocate(aerosols%ammonium_sulphate(ens_size,numlevels))
1779 allocate(aerosols%sea_salt_bin1(ens_size,numlevels))
1780 allocate(aerosols%sea_salt_bin2(ens_size,numlevels))
1781 allocate(aerosols%sea_salt_bin3(ens_size,numlevels))
1782 allocate(aerosols%hydrophilic_organic_matter(ens_size,numlevels))
1783
1784 aerosols%black_carbon = 0.0_jprb
1785 aerosols%dust_bin1 = 0.0_jprb
1786 aerosols%dust_bin2 = 0.0_jprb
1787 aerosols%dust_bin3 = 0.0_jprb
1788 aerosols%ammonium_sulphate = 0.0_jprb
1789 aerosols%sea_salt_bin1 = 0.0_jprb
1790 aerosols%sea_salt_bin2 = 0.0_jprb
1791 aerosols%sea_salt_bin3 = 0.0_jprb
1792 aerosols%hydrophilic_organic_matter = 0.0_jprb
1793else
1794 ! error
1795 write(string1,*)"Unknown aerosl_type:",aerosl_type
1796 call error_handler(e_err, routine, string1, source, revision, revdate)
1797end if
1798
1799end subroutine aerosol_profile_setup
1800
1801subroutine cloud_profile_setup(clouds, ens_size, numlevels, &
1802 cfrac_data, clw_data, clw_scheme, rain_data, ciw_data, &
1803 ice_scheme, use_icede, snow_data, graupel_data, &
1804 hail_data, w_data, htfrtc_simple_cloud)
1805
1806type(cloud_profile_type), intent(inout) :: clouds
1807integer, intent(in) :: ens_size
1808integer, intent(in) :: numlevels
1809logical, intent(in) :: cfrac_data
1810logical, intent(in) :: clw_data
1811integer, intent(in) :: clw_scheme
1812logical, intent(in) :: rain_data
1813logical, intent(in) :: ciw_data
1814integer, intent(in) :: ice_scheme
1815logical, intent(in) :: use_icede
1816logical, intent(in) :: snow_data
1817logical, intent(in) :: graupel_data
1818logical, intent(in) :: hail_data
1819logical, intent(in) :: w_data
1820logical, intent(in) :: htfrtc_simple_cloud
1821
1822! RTTOV wants layers, but models probably prefer levels
1823if (cfrac_data) then
1824 allocate(clouds%cfrac(ens_size, numlevels))
1825 clouds%cfrac = 0.0_jprb
1826end if
1827
1828if (clw_data) then
1829 allocate(clouds%clw(ens_size, numlevels))
1830 clouds%clw = 0.0_jprb
1831
1832 if (clw_scheme == 2) then
1833 allocate(clouds%clwde(ens_size, numlevels))
1834 clouds%clwde = 0.0_jprb
1835 end if
1836end if
1837
1838if (rain_data) then
1839 allocate(clouds%rain(ens_size, numlevels))
1840 clouds%rain = 0.0_jprb
1841end if
1842
1843if (ciw_data) then
1844 allocate(clouds%ciw(ens_size, numlevels))
1845 clouds%ciw = 0.0_jprb
1846 if (ice_scheme == 1 .and. use_icede) then
1847 allocate(clouds%icede(ens_size, numlevels))
1848 clouds%icede = 0.0_jprb
1849 end if
1850end if
1851
1852if (snow_data) then
1853 allocate(clouds%snow(ens_size, numlevels))
1854 clouds%snow = 0.0_jprb
1855end if
1856
1857if (graupel_data) then
1858 allocate(clouds%graupel(ens_size, numlevels))
1859 clouds%graupel = 0.0_jprb
1860end if
1861
1862if (hail_data) then
1863 allocate(clouds%hail(ens_size, numlevels))
1864 clouds%hail = 0.0_jprb
1865end if
1866
1867if (w_data) then
1868 allocate(clouds%w(ens_size, numlevels))
1869 clouds%w = 0.0_jprb
1870end if
1871
1872if (htfrtc_simple_cloud) then
1873 allocate(clouds%simple_cfrac(ens_size))
1874 allocate(clouds%ctp(ens_size))
1875 clouds%simple_cfrac = 0.0_jprb
1876 clouds%ctp = 0.0_jprb
1877end if
1878
1879end subroutine cloud_profile_setup
1880
1881!----------------------------------------------------------------------
1882! Run the forward model for the given sensor, preallocating arrays and
1883! initializing the sensor if necessary (which will be on the first call
1884! to this operator and the first time using the sensor, respectively).
1885!
1886! istatus: Returns 0 if everything is OK, >0 if error occured.
1887! 101 = zenith angle was greater than max_zenith_angle
1888! 102 = non-monotonic pressure detected
1889
1890subroutine do_forward_model(ens_size, nlevels, flavor, location, &
1891 atmos, trace_gas, clouds, aerosols, sensor, channel, &
1892 first_lvl_is_sfc, mw_clear_sky_only, clw_scheme, ice_scheme, &
1893 idg_scheme, aerosl_type, do_lambertian, use_totalice, &
1894 use_zeeman, radiances, error_status, visir_md, mw_md)
1895
1896integer, intent(in) :: ens_size
1897integer, intent(in) :: nlevels
1898integer, intent(in) :: flavor
1899type(location_type), intent(in) :: location
1900type(atmos_profile_type), intent(in) :: atmos
1901type(trace_gas_profile_type), intent(in) :: trace_gas
1902type(cloud_profile_type), intent(in) :: clouds
1903type(aerosol_profile_type), intent(in) :: aerosols
1904type(rttov_sensor_type), pointer :: sensor
1905integer, intent(in) :: channel
1906logical, intent(in) :: first_lvl_is_sfc
1907logical, intent(in) :: mw_clear_sky_only
1908integer, intent(in) :: clw_scheme
1909integer, intent(in) :: ice_scheme
1910integer, intent(in) :: idg_scheme
1911integer, intent(in) :: aerosl_type
1912logical, intent(in) :: do_lambertian
1913logical, intent(in) :: use_totalice
1914logical, intent(in) :: use_zeeman
1915real(r8), intent(out) :: radiances(ens_size)
1916integer, intent(out) :: error_status(ens_size)
1917type(visir_metadata_type), pointer, intent(in) :: visir_md
1918type(mw_metadata_type), pointer, intent(in) :: mw_md
1919
1920character(len=obstypelength) :: obs_qty_string
1921integer :: obs_type_num
1922
1923integer :: ilvl, imem
1924
1925! observation location variables
1926real(r8) :: lon, lat, obsloc(3)
1927
1928integer(kind=jpim) :: j, nch
1929
1930! Return error status of RTTOV subroutine calls
1931integer(kind=jpim) :: errorstatus
1932
1933type(rttov_sensor_runtime_type), pointer :: runtime
1934
1935character(len=512) :: string1
1936character(len=512) :: string2
1937
1938character(len=*), parameter :: routine = 'do_forward_model'
1939
1940real(jprb) :: maxw
1941
1942logical :: is_visir
1943logical :: is_mw
1944logical :: is_cumulus
1945integer :: instrument(3)
1946integer :: surftype
1947
1948if (.not. associated(sensor)) then
1949 write(string1,*)'Passed an unassociated sensor'
1950 call error_handler(e_err, routine, string1, source, revision, revdate)
1951end if
1952
1953error_status(:) = 0 ! 0 is success
1954
1955string2 = 'name: ' // trim(sensor % base_obs_type)
1956
1957instrument(1) = sensor % platform_id
1958instrument(2) = sensor % satellite_id
1959instrument(3) = sensor % sensor_id
1960
1961is_visir = associated(visir_md)
1962is_mw = associated(mw_md)
1963
1964if (.not. is_visir .and. .not. is_mw) then
1965 write(string1,*)'Neither vis/ir nor mw metadata were present for platform/sat/sensor id combination:',&
1966 sensor % platform_id,sensor % satellite_id,sensor % sensor_id
1967 call error_handler(e_err, routine, string1, source, revision, revdate, text2=string2)
1968end if
1969
1970if (is_visir .and. is_mw) then
1971 write(string1,*)'Both vis/ir and mw metadata were present (only one can be specified) for platform/sat/sensor id combination:',&
1972 sensor % platform_id,sensor % satellite_id,sensor % sensor_id
1973 call error_handler(e_err, routine, string1, source, revision, revdate, text2=string2)
1974end if
1975
1976runtime => sensor % runtime
1977
1978if (.not. associated(runtime)) then
1979 write(string1,*)'Runtime information not initialized for platform/sat/sensor id combination:',&
1980 instrument
1981 call error_handler(e_err, routine, string1, source, revision, revdate, text2=string2)
1982end if
1983
1984obsloc = get_location(location)
1985
1986lon = obsloc(1) ! degree: 0 to 360
1987lat = obsloc(2) ! degree: -90 to 90
1988! ignore the 3rd dimension of the observation location for now
1989!height = obsloc(3) ! (m)
1990
1991! --------------------------------------------------------------------------
1992! 4. Build the list of profile/channel indices in chanprof
1993! --------------------------------------------------------------------------
1994
1995nch = 0_jpim
1996do j = 1, ens_size
1997 nch = nch + 1_jpim
1998 runtime % chanprof(nch) % prof = j
1999 runtime % chanprof(nch) % chan = channel
2000end do
2001
2002! We would like a level index array to allow either surface first or surface last order
2003
2004! One would assume the number of levels would not change between calls, but check
2005if (allocated(lvlidx) .and. size(lvlidx) /= nlevels) then
2006 write(string1,*)'Number of levels changed from ',size(lvlidx),' to ',nlevels,&
2007 ' for platform/sat/sensor id combination:',instrument
2008 call error_handler(e_warn, routine, string1, source, revision, revdate, text2=string2)
2009
2010 ! deallocate so we can try again here with the right number of levels
2011 deallocate(lvlidx)
2012 deallocate(ly1idx)
2013 deallocate(ly2idx)
2014 deallocate(totalwater)
2015 deallocate(totalice)
2016end if
2017
2018! (re)allocate if necessary
2019if (.not. allocated(lvlidx)) then
2020 allocate(lvlidx(nlevels))
2021 allocate(ly1idx(nlevels-1))
2022 allocate(ly2idx(nlevels-1))
2023 allocate(totalwater(nlevels))
2024 allocate(totalice(nlevels))
2025end if
2026
2027! finally set the array to the correct order
2028if (first_lvl_is_sfc) then
2029 do ilvl=1,nlevels
2030 lvlidx(ilvl) = nlevels - ilvl + 1
2031 end do
2032else
2033 do ilvl=nlevels,1,-1
2034 lvlidx(ilvl) = ilvl
2035 end do
2036end if
2037
2038! used for averaging levels to layers
2039ly1idx = lvlidx(1:nlevels-1)
2040ly2idx = lvlidx(2:nlevels)
2041
2042! Loop over all of the ensemble members
2043! There is one profile per ensemble member
2044DO imem = 1, ens_size
2045
2046 ! check that the pressure is monotonically increasing from TOA down
2047 do ilvl = 1, nlevels-1
2048 if (atmos % pressure(imem,lvlidx(ilvl)) >= atmos % pressure(imem,lvlidx(ilvl+1))) then
2049 if (debug) then
2050 write(string1,*) 'For ens #',imem,', pressure ',lvlidx(ilvl),' was greater than or equal to pressure ',&
2051 lvlidx(ilvl+1),':',atmos % pressure(imem,lvlidx(ilvl)),' >= ',atmos%pressure(imem,lvlidx(ilvl+1))
2052 call error_handler(e_allmsg,routine,string1,source,revision,revdate)
2053 end if
2054
2055 radiances(:) = missing_r8
2056 error_status(:) = 102
2057 return
2058 end if
2059 end do
2060
2061 surftype = nint(atmos%surftype(imem))
2062
2063 runtime % profiles(imem) % nlevels = nlevels
2064 runtime % profiles(imem) % nlayers = nlevels - 1
2065 runtime % profiles(imem) % gas_units = 1 ! 1 = kg/kg, 2 = ppmv
2066 runtime % profiles(imem) % mmr_cldaer = .true. ! kg/kg
2067 runtime % profiles(imem) % clw_scheme = clw_scheme
2068 runtime % profiles(imem) % ice_scheme = ice_scheme
2069 runtime % profiles(imem) % idg = idg_scheme
2070
2071 ! set the required profile variables
2072 runtime % profiles(imem) % p(:) = atmos % pressure(imem,lvlidx)/100.0_jprb ! Pa -> hPa
2073 runtime % profiles(imem) % t(:) = atmos % temperature(imem,lvlidx)
2074 runtime % profiles(imem) % q(:) = max(atmos % moisture(imem,lvlidx),1e-8_jprb)
2075
2076 ! set trace gases if opts present and individual flags are used
2077 ! the arrays are assumed to have been allocated - this was already checked in obs_def
2078 if (is_visir .or. mw_clear_sky_only) then
2079 if (runtime % opts % rt_ir % ozone_data) then
2080 runtime % profiles(imem) % o3(:) = max(trace_gas % ozone(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2081 end if
2082
2083 if (runtime % opts % rt_ir % co2_data) then
2084 runtime % profiles(imem) % co2(:) = max(trace_gas % co2(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2085 end if
2086
2087 if (runtime % opts % rt_ir % n2o_data) then
2088 runtime % profiles(imem) % n2o(:) = max(trace_gas % n2o(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2089 end if
2090
2091 if (runtime % opts % rt_ir % ch4_data) then
2092 runtime % profiles(imem) % ch4(:) = max(trace_gas % ch4(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2093 end if
2094
2095 if (runtime % opts % rt_ir % co_data) then
2096 runtime % profiles(imem) % co(:) = max(trace_gas % co(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2097 end if
2098
2099 if (runtime % opts % rt_ir % so2_data) then
2100 runtime % profiles(imem) % so2(:) = max(trace_gas % so2(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2101 end if
2102
2103 ! "clear-sky" cloud-liquid water data for microwave (not RTTOV-SCATT)
2104 if (is_mw .and. runtime % opts % rt_mw % clw_data) then
2105 runtime % profiles(imem) % clw(:) = max(clouds % clw(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2106 end if
2107
2108 ! add aerosols
2109 if (runtime % opts % rt_ir % addaerosl) then
2110 if (aerosl_type == 1) then
2111 ! OPAC, convert from levels to layers
2112 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(1,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % insoluble(imem,ly1idx) + &
2113 aerosols % insoluble(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2114 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(2,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % water_soluble(imem,ly1idx) + &
2115 aerosols % water_soluble(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2116 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(3,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % soot(imem,ly1idx) + &
2117 aerosols % soot(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2118 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(4,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % sea_salt_accum(imem,ly1idx) + &
2119 aerosols % sea_salt_accum(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2120 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(5,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % sea_salt_coarse(imem,ly1idx) + &
2121 aerosols % sea_salt_coarse(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2122 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(6,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % mineral_nucleus(imem,ly1idx) + &
2123 aerosols % mineral_nucleus(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2124 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(7,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % mineral_accum(imem,ly1idx) + &
2125 aerosols % mineral_accum(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2126 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(8,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % mineral_coarse(imem,ly1idx) + &
2127 aerosols % mineral_coarse(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2128 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(9,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % mineral_transport(imem,ly1idx) + &
2129 aerosols % mineral_transport(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2130 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(10,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % sulphated_droplets(imem,ly1idx) + &
2131 aerosols % sulphated_droplets(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2132 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(11,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % volcanic_ash(imem,ly1idx) + &
2133 aerosols % volcanic_ash(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2134 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(12,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % new_volcanic_ash(imem,ly1idx) + &
2135 aerosols % new_volcanic_ash(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2136 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(13,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % asian_dust(imem,ly1idx) + &
2137 aerosols % asian_dust(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2138 elseif (aerosl_type == 2) then
2139 ! CAMS, convert from levels to levels
2140 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(1,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % black_carbon(imem,ly1idx) + &
2141 aerosols % black_carbon(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2142 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(2,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % dust_bin1(imem,ly1idx) + &
2143 aerosols % dust_bin1(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2144 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(3,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % dust_bin2(imem,ly1idx) + &
2145 aerosols % dust_bin2(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2146 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(4,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % dust_bin3(imem,ly1idx) + &
2147 aerosols % dust_bin3(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2148 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(5,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % ammonium_sulphate(imem,ly1idx) + &
2149 aerosols % ammonium_sulphate(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2150 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(6,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % sea_salt_bin1(imem,ly1idx) + &
2151 aerosols % sea_salt_bin1(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2152 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(7,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % sea_salt_bin2(imem,ly1idx) + &
2153 aerosols % sea_salt_bin2(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2154 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(8,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % sea_salt_bin3(imem,ly1idx) + &
2155 aerosols % sea_salt_bin3(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2156 runtime % profiles(imem) % aerosols(9,:) = max(0.5_jprb*(aerosols % hydrophilic_organic_matter(imem,ly1idx) + &
2157 aerosols % hydrophilic_organic_matter(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8)
2158 else
2159 write(string1,*)'Unknown aerosol type ',aerosl_type,&
2160 ' for platform/sat/sensor id combination:',instrument
2161 call error_handler(e_err, routine, string1, source, revision, revdate, text2=string2)
2162 end if
2163 end if ! add aerosols
2164
2165 ! add IR clouds
2166 if (runtime % opts % rt_ir % addclouds) then
2167 ! first find the total water and ice components
2168
2169 totalwater(:) = 0.0_jprb
2170
2171 if (allocated(clouds % clw)) then
2172 totalwater(:) = totalwater(:) + max(clouds % clw(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2173 end if
2174
2175 if (allocated(clouds % rain)) then
2176 totalwater(:) = totalwater(:) + max(clouds % rain(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2177 end if
2178
2179 totalice(:) = 0.0_r8
2180
2181 if (allocated(clouds % ciw)) then
2182 totalice(:) = totalice(:) + max(clouds % ciw(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2183 end if
2184
2185 if (allocated(clouds % snow)) then
2186 totalice(:) = totalice(:) + max(clouds % snow(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2187 end if
2188
2189 if (allocated(clouds % graupel)) then
2190 totalice(:) = totalice(:) + max(clouds % graupel(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2191 end if
2192
2193 if (allocated(clouds % hail)) then
2194 totalice(:) = totalice(:) + max(clouds % hail(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2195 end if
2196
2197 ! Classify liquid water cloud type. If the maximum absolute w is > 0.5 m/s, classify as a cumulus cloud.
2198 ! FIXME: consider adding 0.5 as a namelist parameter
2199 if (allocated(clouds % w)) then
2200 maxw = maxval(abs(clouds % w(imem,:)))
2201 is_cumulus = maxw > 0.5_jprb ! m/s
2202 else
2203 ! assume cumulus if w not provided
2204 is_cumulus = .true.
2205 end if
2206
2207 ! depending on the vertical velocity and land type, classify clouds the way RTTOV wants
2208 if (.not. is_cumulus) then
2209 ! stratus
2210 if (surftype == 0) then
2211 ! 1, Stratus Continental, STCO (kg/kg), convert levels to layers
2212 runtime % profiles(imem) % cloud(1,:) = 0.5_jprb*(totalwater(ly1idx) + &
2213 totalwater(ly2idx))
2214 else
2215 ! 2, Stratus Maritime, STMA (kg/kg), convert levels to layers
2216 runtime % profiles(imem) % cloud(2,:) = 0.5_jprb*(totalwater(ly1idx) + &
2217 totalwater(ly2idx))
2218 end if
2219 else
2220 ! cumulus
2221 if (surftype == 0) then
2222 ! 3, Cumulus Continental Clean, CUCC (kg/kg), convert levels to layers
2223 runtime % profiles(imem) % cloud(3,:) = 0.5_jprb*(totalwater(ly1idx) + &
2224 totalwater(ly2idx))
2225 ! FIXME: give user (or obs) control over CUCC versus CUCP
2226 ! 4, Cumulus Continental Polluted, CUCP (kg/kg), convert levels to layers
2227 ! runtime % profiles(imem) % cloud(4,:) = 0.5_jprb*(totalwater(ly1idx) + totalwater(ly2idx))
2228 else
2229 ! 5, Cumulus Maritime, CUMA (kg/kg), convert levels to layers
2230 runtime % profiles(imem) % cloud(5,:) = 0.5_jprb*(totalwater(ly1idx) + &
2231 totalwater(ly2idx))
2232 end if
2233 end if
2234
2235 ! allow specification of cloud water effective diameter
2236 if (allocated(clouds % clwde)) then
2237 ! Liquid water effective diameter (microns), convert levels to layers
2238 runtime % profiles(imem)% clwde(:) = 0.5_jprb*(clouds % clwde(imem,ly1idx) + &
2239 clouds % clwde(imem,ly2idx))
2240 end if
2241
2242 ! all types of ice cloud (kg/kg) go in 6, Ice Cloud (CIRR, but not just cirrus)
2243 ! convert levels to layers
2244 runtime % profiles(imem) % cloud(6,:) = 0.5_jprb*(totalice(ly1idx) + &
2245 totalice(ly2idx))
2246
2247 ! allow specification of ice effective diameter
2248 if (allocated(clouds % icede)) then
2249 ! Ice effective diameter (microns), convert levels to layers
2250 runtime % profiles(imem) % icede(:) = 0.5_jprb*(clouds % icede(imem,ly1idx) + &
2251 clouds % icede(imem,ly2idx))
2252 end if
2253
2254 if (allocated(clouds % cfrac)) then
2255 ! Cloud fraction (0-1), convert levels to layers
2256 runtime % profiles(imem) % cfrac(:) = min(max(0.5_jprb*(clouds % cfrac(imem,ly1idx) + &
2257 clouds % cfrac(imem,ly2idx)),0.0_r8),1.0_r8)
2258 else
2259 ! Assume cloud fraction is 1 everywhere. No harm if no clouds.
2260 runtime % profiles(imem) % cfrac(:) = 1.0_jprb
2261 end if
2262 end if ! add IR clouds
2263 else if (is_mw) then
2264 ! RTTOV-SCATT, add MW clouds
2265 if (allocated(clouds % cfrac)) then
2266 runtime % cld_profiles(imem) % cc(:) = min(max(clouds % cfrac(imem, lvlidx),0.0_r8),1.0_r8)
2267 else
2268 ! Assume cloud fraction is 1 everywhere. No harm if no clouds.
2269 runtime % cld_profiles(imem) % cc(:) = 1.0_jprb
2270 end if
2271
2272
2273 if (allocated(clouds % clw)) then
2274 runtime % cld_profiles(imem) % clw(:) = max(clouds % clw(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2275 else
2276 runtime % cld_profiles(imem) % clw = 0.0_jprb
2277 end if
2278
2279 if (allocated(clouds % rain)) then
2280 runtime % cld_profiles(imem) % rain(:) = max(clouds % rain(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2281 else
2282 runtime % cld_profiles(imem) % rain = 0.0_jprb
2283 end if
2284
2285 if (use_totalice) then
2286 totalice(:) = 0.0_r8
2287
2288 if (allocated(clouds % ciw)) then
2289 totalice(:) = totalice(:) + max(clouds % ciw(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2290 end if
2291
2292 if (allocated(clouds % snow)) then
2293 totalice(:) = totalice(:) + max(clouds % snow(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2294 end if
2295
2296 if (allocated(clouds % graupel)) then
2297 totalice(:) = totalice(:) + max(clouds % graupel(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2298 end if
2299
2300 if (allocated(clouds % hail)) then
2301 totalice(:) = totalice(:) + max(clouds % hail(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2302 end if
2303
2304 runtime % cld_profiles(imem) % totalice(:) = totalice(:)
2305 else
2306 if (allocated(clouds % ciw)) then
2307 runtime % cld_profiles(imem) % ciw(:) = max(clouds % ciw(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2308 end if
2309
2310 ! "totalice" here is being used only for solid precipitation (no ciw)
2311 totalice(:) = 0.0_r8
2312
2313 if (allocated(clouds % snow)) then
2314 totalice(:) = totalice(:) + max(clouds % snow(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2315 end if
2316
2317 if (allocated(clouds % graupel)) then
2318 totalice(:) = totalice(:) + max(clouds % graupel(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2319 end if
2320
2321 if (allocated(clouds % hail)) then
2322 totalice(:) = totalice(:) + max(clouds % hail(imem,lvlidx),0.0_r8)
2323 end if
2324
2325 runtime % cld_profiles(imem) % sp(:) = totalice(:)
2326 end if
2327
2328 ! also add "half-level pressures" as requested by RTTOV-Scatt
2329 runtime % cld_profiles(imem) % ph(2:nlevels) = 0.5_jprb*(atmos % pressure(imem,ly1idx)+atmos % pressure(imem,ly2idx))/100.0_jprb
2330 runtime % cld_profiles(imem) % ph(nlevels+1) = atmos % sfc_p(imem)/100.0_jprb
2331 runtime % cld_profiles(imem) % ph(1) = 0.0_jprb
2332 else
2333 write(string1,*)'Neither opts or opts_scatter were available for platform/sat/sensor id combination:',&
2334 instrument
2335 call error_handler(e_err, routine, string1, source, revision, revdate, text2=string2)
2336 end if ! has runtime % opts or runtime % opts_scatt
2337
2338 ! 2m above surface pressure (hPa)
2339 runtime % profiles(imem) % s2m % p = atmos % sfc_p(imem)/100.0_jprb ! convert from Pa to hPa
2340 ! 2m above surface temperature (K)
2341 runtime % profiles(imem) % s2m % t = atmos % s2m_t(imem)
2342
2343 ! set the optional variables
2344 if (allocated(atmos % s2m_q)) then
2345 ! 2m above surface water vapor (kg/kg)
2346 runtime % profiles(imem) % s2m % q = atmos % s2m_q(imem)
2347 end if
2348
2349 if (allocated(atmos % s10m_u) .and. allocated(atmos % s10m_v)) then
2350 ! 10 m above surface u and v wind (m/s)
2351 runtime % profiles(imem) % s2m % u = atmos % s10m_u(imem)
2352 runtime % profiles(imem) % s2m % v = atmos % s10m_v(imem)
2353 end if
2354
2355 if (allocated(atmos % wfetch)) then
2356 ! Wind fetch over the ocean (m)
2357 runtime % profiles(imem) % s2m % wfetc = atmos % wfetch(imem)
2358 end if
2359
2360 ! Surface type (0=land, 1=sea, 2=sea-ice)
2361 runtime % profiles(imem) % skin % surftype = surftype
2362
2363 if (allocated(atmos % water_type)) then
2364 ! Water type (0=fresh, 1=ocean)
2365 runtime % profiles(imem) % skin % watertype = nint(atmos % water_type(imem))
2366 end if
2367
2368 ! Surface skin temperature (K)
2369 runtime % profiles(imem) % skin % t = atmos % skin_temp(imem)
2370
2371 if (allocated(atmos % sfc_salinity)) then
2372 ! Surface ocean salinity (practical salinity unit)
2373 runtime % profiles(imem) % skin % salinity = atmos % sfc_salinity(imem)
2374 end if
2375
2376 if (allocated(atmos % sfc_foam_frac)) then
2377 ! Surface foam fraction (0-1)
2378 runtime % profiles(imem) % skin % foam_fraction = min(max(atmos % sfc_foam_frac(imem),0.0_r8),1.0_r8)
2379 end if
2380
2381 if (allocated(atmos % sfc_snow_frac)) then
2382 ! Surface snow fraction (0-1)
2383 runtime % profiles(imem) % skin % snow_fraction = min(max(atmos % sfc_snow_frac(imem),0.0_r8),1.0_r8)
2384 end if
2385
2386 if (is_mw) then
2387 ! FASTEM parameters, see RTTOV user guide e.g. Table 21
2388 runtime % profiles(imem) % skin % fastem(1) = mw_md%fastem_p1
2389 runtime % profiles(imem) % skin % fastem(2) = mw_md%fastem_p2
2390 runtime % profiles(imem) % skin % fastem(3) = mw_md%fastem_p3
2391 runtime % profiles(imem) % skin % fastem(4) = mw_md%fastem_p4
2392 runtime % profiles(imem) % skin % fastem(5) = mw_md%fastem_p5
2393 end if
2394
2395 if (is_visir .and. do_lambertian) then
2396 ! Surface specularity (0-1)
2397 runtime % profiles(imem) % skin % specularity = min(max(visir_md % specularity,0.0_jprb),1.0_jprb)
2398 end if
2399
2400 if (allocated(clouds % simple_cfrac)) then
2401 ! Simple (column) cloud fraction, 0-1
2402 runtime % profiles(imem) % cfraction = min(max(clouds % simple_cfrac(imem),0.0_r8),1.0_r8)
2403 end if
2404
2405 if (allocated(clouds % ctp)) then
2406 ! Simple (column) cloud top pressure, hPa
2407 runtime % profiles(imem) % ctp = clouds % ctp(imem)
2408 end if
2409
2410 if (is_visir) then
2411 ! Sat. zenith and azimuth angles (degrees)
2412 if (visir_md % sat_ze > max_zenith_angle) then
2413 radiances(:) = missing_r8
2414 error_status(:) = 101
2415 return
2416 end if
2417 runtime % profiles(imem) % zenangle = max(visir_md % sat_ze,0.0_jprb)
2418 runtime % profiles(imem) % azangle = visir_md % sat_az
2419
2420 ! Solar zenith and azimuth angles (degrees), only relevant if use_solar
2421 runtime % profiles(imem) % sunzenangle = max(visir_md % sun_ze,0.0_jprb)
2422 runtime % profiles(imem) % sunazangle = visir_md % sun_az
2423 else
2424 if (mw_md % sat_ze > max_zenith_angle) then
2425 radiances(:) = missing_r8
2426 error_status(:) = 101
2427 return
2428 end if
2429 ! Sat. zenith and azimuth angles (degrees)
2430 runtime % profiles(imem) % zenangle = max(mw_md % sat_ze,0.0_jprb)
2431 runtime % profiles(imem) % azangle = mw_md % sat_az
2432 end if
2433
2434 ! Elevation (km), latitude and longitude (degrees)
2435 runtime % profiles(imem) % latitude = lat
2436 runtime % profiles(imem) % longitude = lon
2437 runtime % profiles(imem) % elevation = atmos % sfc_elev(imem)/1000.0_jprb ! m -> km
2438
2439 if (use_zeeman .and. is_mw) then
2440 runtime % profiles(imem) % Be = mw_md % mag_field ! mag field strength, Gauss
2441 runtime % profiles(imem) % cosbk = mw_md % cosbk ! cosine of angle between mag field and viewing angle
2442 end if
2443end do ! profile data
2444
2445! --------------------------------------------------------------------------
2446! 6. Specify surface emissivity and reflectance
2447! --------------------------------------------------------------------------
2448
2449! Here we assume we have no values for input emissivities
2450runtime % emissivity(:) % emis_in = 0._jprb
2451
2452! Calculate emissivity within RTTOV where the input emissivity value is
2453! zero or less (all channels in this case)
2454runtime % calcemis(:) = (runtime % emissivity(:) % emis_in <= 0._jprb)
2455
2456! In this example we have no values for input reflectances
2457runtime % reflectance(:) % refl_in = 0._jprb
2458
2459! Calculate BRDF within RTTOV where the input BRDF value is zero or less
2460! (all channels in this case)
2461runtime % calcrefl(:) = (runtime % reflectance(:) % refl_in <= 0._jprb)
2462
2463! Use default cloud top BRDF for simple cloud in VIS/NIR channels
2464runtime % reflectance(:) % refl_cloud_top = 0._jprb
2465
2466if (debug) then
2467 print *,'is_visir:',is_visir
2468 call rttov_print_opts(runtime % opts, lu=ioout)
2469 call rttov_print_profile(runtime % profiles(1), lu=ioout)
2470 if (associated(runtime % opts_scatt)) then
2471 call rttov_print_opts_scatt(runtime % opts_scatt, lu=ioout)
2472 end if
2473end if
2474
2475
2476if (is_visir .or. mw_clear_sky_only) then
2477 ! Call RTTOV forward model
2478 call rttov_direct ( &
2479 errorstatus, & ! out error flag
2480 runtime % chanprof, & ! in channel and profile index structure
2481 runtime % opts, & ! in options structure
2482 runtime % profiles, & ! in profile array
2483 runtime % coefs, & ! in coefficients structure
2484 runtime % transmission, & ! inout computed transmittances
2485 runtime % radiance, & ! inout computed radiances
2486 calcemis = runtime % calcemis, & ! in flag for internal emissivity calcs
2487 emissivity = runtime % emissivity, & ! inout input/output emissivities per channel
2488 calcrefl = runtime % calcrefl, & ! in flag for internal BRDF calcs
2489 reflectance = runtime % reflectance ) ! inout input/output BRDFs per channel
2490
2491 if (errorstatus /= errorstatus_success) then
2492 write(string1,*)'RTTOV direct error for platform/satellite/sensor id:',&
2493 instrument
2494 call error_handler(e_err, routine, string1, source, revision, revdate, text2=string2)
2495 end if
2496else
2497 ! set the frequencies based on which channel is being called
2498 runtime % frequencies(:) = runtime % frequencies_all(channel)
2499
2500 if (debug) then
2501 call rttov_print_opts_scatt(runtime % opts_scatt, lu=ioout)
2502 call rttov_print_cld_profile(runtime % cld_profiles(1), lu=ioout)
2503 end if
2504
2505 call rttov_scatt ( &
2506 errorstatus, & ! out error flag
2507 runtime % opts_scatt, & ! in RTTOV-SCATT options structure
2508 nlevels, & ! in number of profile levels
2509 runtime % chanprof, & ! in channel and profile index structure
2510 runtime % frequencies, & ! in channel indexes for Mietable lookup
2511 runtime % profiles, & ! in profile array
2512 runtime % cld_profiles, & ! in cloud/hydrometeor profile array
2513 runtime % coefs, & ! in coefficients structure
2514 runtime % coefs_scatt, & ! in Mietable structure
2515 runtime % calcemis, & ! in flag for internal emissivity calcs
2516 runtime % emissivity, & ! inout input/output emissivities per channel
2517 runtime % radiance ) ! inout computed radiances
2518
2519 if (errorstatus /= errorstatus_success) then
2520 write(string1,*)'RTTOV scatt error for platform/satellite/sensor id:',&
2521 instrument
2522 call error_handler(e_err, routine, string1, source, revision, revdate, text2=string2)
2523 end if
2524end if
2525
2526! utility from obs_kind_mod for getting string of obs qty
2527obs_qty_string = get_name_for_type_of_obs(flavor)
2528obs_type_num = get_quantity_for_type_of_obs(flavor)
2529
2530if (obs_type_num == qty_radiance) then
2531 do imem = 1, ens_size
2532 radiances(imem) = runtime % radiance % total(imem)
2533 end do
2534 if (debug) then
2535 print*, 'RADIANCE % TOTAL for ',trim(obs_qty_string),'= ', radiances(:)
2536 end if
2537elseif (obs_type_num == qty_brightness_temperature) then
2538 do imem = 1, ens_size
2539 radiances(imem) = runtime % radiance % bt(imem)
2540 end do
2541 if (debug) then
2542 print*, 'RADIANCE % BT for ',trim(obs_qty_string),'= ', radiances(:)
2543 end if
2544elseif (obs_type_num == qty_bi_directional_reflectance) then
2545 do imem = 1, ens_size
2546 radiances(imem) = runtime % radiance % refl(imem)
2547 end do
2548 if (debug) then
2549 print*, 'RADIANCE % REFL for ',trim(obs_qty_string),'= ', radiances(:)
2550 end if
2551else
2552 call error_handler(e_err, 'unknown observation quantity for ' // trim(obs_qty_string), &
2553 source, revision, revdate)
2554end if
2555
2556IF (errorstatus /= errorstatus_success) THEN
2557 WRITE (*,*) 'rttov_direct error'
2558 !CALL rttov_exit(errorstatus)
2559ENDIF
2560
2561end subroutine do_forward_model
2562
2563!--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2564
2565subroutine sensor_runtime_takedown(runtime, error_status)
2566
2567type(rttov_sensor_runtime_type), pointer :: runtime
2568integer, intent(out) :: error_status
2569
2570integer :: nchanprof
2571integer :: nlevels
2572
2573! Return error status of RTTOV subroutine calls
2574integer(kind=jpim) :: errorstatus
2575
2576!FIXME - in the forward operator code we won't be deallocating
2577! this structure.
2578
2579! initialize error status tp success
2580error_status = errorstatus_success
2581
2582! Deallocate all RTTOV arrays and structures
2583
2584nchanprof = size(runtime % chanprof)
2585nlevels = size(runtime % profiles(1) % p)
2586
2587call rttov_alloc_direct( &
2588 errorstatus, &
2589 0_jpim, & ! 0 => deallocate
2590 nchanprof, & ! DART only does one channel at a time, so nchanprof = nprof
2591 nchanprof, &
2592 nlevels, &
2593 runtime % chanprof, &
2594 runtime % opts, &
2595 runtime % profiles, &
2596 runtime % coefs, &
2597 runtime % transmission, &
2598 runtime % radiance, &
2599 calcemis=runtime % calcemis, &
2600 emissivity=runtime % emissivity, &
2601 calcrefl=runtime % calcrefl, &
2602 reflectance=runtime % reflectance)
2603
2604IF (errorstatus /= errorstatus_success) THEN
2605 WRITE(*,*) 'deallocation error for rttov_direct structures'
2606 error_status = errorstatus
2607 return
2608ENDIF
2609
2610CALL rttov_dealloc_coefs(errorstatus, runtime % coefs)
2611IF (errorstatus /= errorstatus_success) THEN
2612 WRITE(*,*) 'coefs deallocation error'
2613ENDIF
2614
2615end subroutine sensor_runtime_takedown
2616

2818
2819!----------------------------------------------------------------------
2820! Initialize a RTTOV sensor runtime. A rttov_sensor_type instance contains
2821! information such as options and coefficients that are initialized in a "lazy"
2822! fashion only when it will be used for the first time.
2823
2824subroutine initialize_rttov_sensor_runtime(sensor,ens_size,nlevels)
2825
2826type(rttov_sensor_type), pointer :: sensor
2827integer, intent(in) :: ens_size
2828integer, intent(in) :: nlevels
2829
2830type(rttov_options), pointer :: opts
2831type(rttov_options_scatt), pointer :: opts_scatt
2832logical :: is_mw
2833logical :: is_vis
2834logical :: is_ir
2835logical :: is_visir
2836
2837if (.not. module_initialized) then
2838 call initialize_module()
2839end if
2840
2841if (.not. associated(sensor)) then
2842 write(string1,*) "The sensor must be initialized before initializing a rttov sensor runtime"
2843 call error_handler(e_err, 'initialize_rttov', string1, source, revision, revdate)
2844end if
2845
2846! some logicals to ease in setting the options
2847is_mw = sensor%sensor_type_name == 'mw'
2848is_vis = sensor%sensor_type_name == 'vis'
2849is_ir = sensor%sensor_type_name == 'ir'
2850is_visir = is_vis .or. is_ir
2851
2852allocate(opts)
2853! these options have descriptions above, except for where defaults are set outside of user-control
2854opts % interpolation % addinterp = .true. ! Allow interpolation of input profile
2855opts % interpolation % reg_limit_extrap = .true. ! Extrapolate beyond top of model intelligently
2856opts % interpolation % interp_mode = interp_mode
2857opts % interpolation % lgradp = .false. ! Do not allow TL/AD/K of user pressure levels
2858opts % interpolation % spacetop = .true. ! Treat model top as space boundary (not recommended to be false)
2859
2860opts % config % do_checkinput = do_checkinput
2861opts % config % apply_reg_limits = apply_reg_limits
2862opts % config % verbose = verbose
2863opts % config % fix_hgpl = fix_hgpl
2864
2865opts % rt_all % switchrad = is_mw ! switch to BT for AD/K if microwave
2866opts % rt_all % do_lambertian = do_lambertian
2867opts % rt_all % lambertian_fixed_angle = lambertian_fixed_angle
2868opts % rt_all % rad_down_lin_tau = rad_down_lin_tau
2869opts % rt_all % use_q2m = use_q2m
2870opts % rt_all % addrefrac = addrefrac
2871opts % rt_all % plane_parallel = plane_parallel
2872
2873if (is_mw) then
2874 ! mw options could be used with direct or scatt, so set them here
2875 opts % rt_mw % apply_band_correction = apply_band_correction
2876 opts % rt_mw % clw_data = clw_data
2877 opts % rt_mw % clw_calc_on_coef_lev = .false. ! calculate CLW optical depths on input levels
2878 opts % rt_mw % clw_scheme = clw_scheme
2879 opts % rt_mw % clw_cloud_top = clw_cloud_top
2880 opts % rt_mw % fastem_version = fastem_version
2881 opts % rt_mw % supply_foam_fraction = supply_foam_fraction
2882end if
2883
2884if (is_mw .and. .not. mw_clear_sky_only) then
2885 ! use RTTOV-SCATT
2886 allocate(opts_scatt)
2887
2888 opts_scatt % config % do_checkinput = do_checkinput
2889 opts_scatt % config % apply_reg_limits = apply_reg_limits
2890 opts_scatt % config % verbose = verbose
2891 opts_scatt % config % fix_hgpl = fix_hgpl
2892
2893 opts_scatt % rad_down_lin_tau = rad_down_lin_tau
2894 opts_scatt % apply_band_correction = apply_band_correction
2895 opts_scatt % interp_mode = interp_mode
2896 opts_scatt % lgradp = .false. ! Do not allow TL/AD/K of user pressure levels
2897 opts_scatt % reg_limit_extrap = .true. ! intelligently extend beyond the model top
2898 opts_scatt % fastem_version = fastem_version
2899 opts_scatt % supply_foam_fraction = supply_foam_fraction
2900 opts_scatt % use_q2m = use_q2m
2901 opts_scatt % lradiance = .false. ! Calculate Brightness Temperatures
2902 opts_scatt % lusercfrac = .false. ! Have RTTOV-SCATT calculate the effective cloud fraction
2903 opts_scatt % cc_threshold = cc_threshold
2904
2905 call sensor_runtime_setup(sensor, &
2906 ens_size=ens_size, &
2907 nlevs=nlevels, &
2908 opts=opts, &
2909 opts_scatt=opts_scatt, &
2910 use_totalice=use_totalice)
2911else
2912 opts % rt_ir % ozone_data = ozone_data
2913 opts % rt_ir % co2_data = co2_data
2914 opts % rt_ir % n2o_data = n2o_data
2915 opts % rt_ir % co_data = co_data
2916 opts % rt_ir % ch4_data = ch4_data
2917 opts % rt_ir % so2_data = so2_data
2918 opts % rt_ir % addsolar = addsolar
2919 opts % rt_ir % rayleigh_single_scatt = rayleigh_single_scatt
2920 opts % rt_ir % do_nlte_correction = do_nlte_correction
2921 opts % rt_ir % solar_sea_brdf_model = solar_sea_brdf_model
2922 opts % rt_ir % ir_sea_emis_model = ir_sea_emis_model
2923 opts % rt_ir % addaerosl = add_aerosl
2924 opts % rt_ir % addclouds = add_clouds
2925 opts % rt_ir % user_aer_opt_param = user_aer_opt_param
2926 opts % rt_ir % user_cld_opt_param = user_cld_opt_param
2927 opts % rt_ir % grid_box_avg_cloud = grid_box_avg_cloud
2928 opts % rt_ir % cldstr_threshold = cldstr_threshold
2929 opts % rt_ir % cldstr_simple = cldstr_simple
2930 opts % rt_ir % cldstr_low_cloud_top = cldstr_low_cloud_top
2931 opts % rt_ir % ir_scatt_model = ir_scatt_model
2932 opts % rt_ir % vis_scatt_model = vis_scatt_model
2933 opts % rt_ir % dom_nstreams = dom_nstreams
2934 opts % rt_ir % dom_accuracy = dom_accuracy
2935 opts % rt_ir % dom_opdep_threshold = dom_opdep_threshold
2936
2937 opts % rt_ir % pc % addpc = addpc
2938 opts % rt_ir % pc % npcscores = npcscores
2939 opts % rt_ir % pc % addradrec = addradrec
2940 opts % rt_ir % pc % ipcbnd = 1 ! This is the correct default for RTTOV 12.3
2941 opts % rt_ir % pc % ipcreg = ipcreg
2942
2943 opts % htfrtc_opts % htfrtc = use_htfrtc
2944 opts % htfrtc_opts % n_pc_in = htfrtc_n_pc
2945 opts % htfrtc_opts % reconstruct = .true. ! By default reconstruct radiances
2946 opts % htfrtc_opts % simple_cloud = htfrtc_simple_cloud
2947 opts % htfrtc_opts % overcast = htfrtc_overcast
2948
2949 call sensor_runtime_setup(sensor, &
2950 ens_size=ens_size, &
2951 nlevs=nlevels, &
2952 opts=opts)
2953end if
2954
2955
2956
2957end subroutine initialize_rttov_sensor_runtime
2958
2959!----------------------------------------------------------------------
2960! Fill the module storage metadata for a particular visible/infrared
2961! observation.
2962!
2963! Visible / infrared observations have several auxillary metadata variables.
2964! Other than the key, which is standard DART fare, the RTTOV satellite azimuth
2965! and satellite zenith angle must be specified. See the RTTOV user guide for
2966! more information (in particular, see figure 4). If the *addsolar*
2967! namelist value is set to true, then the solar azimuth and solar zenith angles must
2968! be specified - again see the RTTOV user guide. In addition to the platform/satellite/
2969! sensor ID numbers, which are the RTTOV unique identifiers, the channel specifies
2970! the chanenl number in the RTTOV coefficient file. Finally, if *do_lambertian* is
2971! true, specularity must be specified here. Again, see the RTTOV user guide for more
2972! information.
2973
2974subroutine set_visir_metadata(key, sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze, &
2975 platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel, specularity)
2976
2977integer, intent(out) :: key
2978real(r8), intent(in) :: sat_az, sat_ze
2979real(r8), intent(in) :: sun_az, sun_ze ! only relevant if addsolar
2980integer, intent(in) :: platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
2981real(r8), intent(in) :: specularity ! only relevant if do_lambertian
2982
2983if ( .not. module_initialized ) call initialize_module
2984
2985visirnum = visirnum + 1 ! increase module storage used counters
2986rttovkey = rttovkey + 1
2987
2988! Make sure the new key is within the length of the metadata arrays.
2989call grow_metadata(rttovkey,'set_visir_metadata', visir)
2990
2991key = rttovkey ! now that we know its legal
2992obstype_metadata(subtype, key) = visir
2993obstype_metadata(subkey, key) = visirnum
2994
2995visir_obs_metadata(visirnum) % sat_az = sat_az
2996visir_obs_metadata(visirnum) % sat_ze = sat_ze
2997visir_obs_metadata(visirnum) % sun_az = sun_az
2998visir_obs_metadata(visirnum) % sun_ze = sun_ze
2999visir_obs_metadata(visirnum) % platform_id = platform_id
3000visir_obs_metadata(visirnum) % sat_id = sat_id
3001visir_obs_metadata(visirnum) % sensor_id = sensor_id
3002visir_obs_metadata(visirnum) % channel = channel
3003visir_obs_metadata(visirnum) % specularity = specularity
3004
3005end subroutine set_visir_metadata
3006
3007!----------------------------------------------------------------------
3008! Fill the module storage metadata for a particular microwave
3009! observation.
3010! Microwave observations have several auxillary metadata variables.
3011! Other than the key, which is standard DART fare, the RTTOV satellite azimuth
3012! and satellite zenith angle must be specified. See the RTTOV user guide for
3013! more information (in particular, see figure 4). In addition to the platform/satellite/
3014! sensor ID numbers, which are the RTTOV unique identifiers, the channel specifies
3015! the chanenl number in the RTTOV coefficient file. In addition, if
3016! use_zeeman is true, the magnetic field and cosine of the angle
3017! between the magnetic field and angle of propagation must be specified.
3018! See the RTTOV user guide for more information. Finally, the fastem parameters for
3019! land must be specified here. This may be difficult for observations to set, so
3020! default values (see table 21 in the RTTOV user guide) can be used until a better
3021! solution is devised.
3022
3023subroutine set_mw_metadata(key, sat_az, sat_ze, platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, &
3024 channel, mag_field, cosbk, fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, &
3025 fastem_p4, fastem_p5)
3026
3027integer, intent(out) :: key
3028real(r8), intent(in) :: sat_az, sat_ze
3029integer, intent(in) :: platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3030real(r8), intent(in) :: mag_field, cosbk ! only relevant with use_zeeman
3031real(r8), intent(in) :: fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, & !
3032 fastem_p4, fastem_p5 !5 FASTEM parameters describing the land/sea ice surface, see Table 21 (MW, used in FASTEM and for land/sea ice for TESSM2)
3033
3034if ( .not. module_initialized ) call initialize_module
3035
3036mwnum = mwnum + 1 ! increase module storage used counters
3037rttovkey = rttovkey + 1
3038
3039! Make sure the new key is within the length of the metadata arrays.
3040call grow_metadata(rttovkey,'set_mw_metadata', mw)
3041
3042key = rttovkey ! now that we know its legal
3043obstype_metadata(subtype, key) = mw
3044obstype_metadata(subkey, key) = mwnum
3045
3046
3047mw_obs_metadata(mwnum) % sat_az = sat_az
3048mw_obs_metadata(mwnum) % sat_ze = sat_ze
3049mw_obs_metadata(mwnum) % platform_id = platform_id
3050mw_obs_metadata(mwnum) % sat_id = sat_id
3051mw_obs_metadata(mwnum) % sensor_id = sensor_id
3052mw_obs_metadata(mwnum) % channel = channel
3053mw_obs_metadata(mwnum) % mag_field = mag_field
3054mw_obs_metadata(mwnum) % cosbk = cosbk
3055mw_obs_metadata(mwnum) % fastem_p1 = fastem_p1
3056mw_obs_metadata(mwnum) % fastem_p2 = fastem_p2
3057mw_obs_metadata(mwnum) % fastem_p3 = fastem_p3
3058mw_obs_metadata(mwnum) % fastem_p4 = fastem_p4
3059mw_obs_metadata(mwnum) % fastem_p5 = fastem_p5
3060
3061end subroutine set_mw_metadata
3062
3063
3064!----------------------------------------------------------------------
3065! Query the metadata in module storage for a particular observation.
3066! See set_visir_metadata for more information on these fields.
3067
3068subroutine get_visir_metadata(key, sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze, &
3069 platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel, specularity)
3070
3071integer, intent(in) :: key
3072real(r8), intent(out) :: sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze
3073integer, intent(out) :: platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3074real(r8), intent(out) :: specularity
3075
3076integer :: mykey
3077
3078character(len=*), parameter :: routine = 'get_visir_metadata'
3079
3080if ( .not. module_initialized ) call initialize_module
3081
3082! Make sure the desired key is within the useful length of the metadata arrays.
3083call key_within_range(key,routine)
3084
3085if (obstype_metadata(subtype,key) /= visir) then
3086 write(string1,*)'The obstype metadata for key ',key,'is not visir as expected'
3087 call error_handler(e_err, routine, string1, source, &
3088 revision, revdate)
3089end if
3090
3091mykey = obstype_metadata(subkey,key)
3092
3093if (.not. is_valid_subkey(mykey, visir)) then
3094 write(string1,*)'The visir-specific key ',mykey,'is invalid.'
3095 write(string2,*)'Size of visir_obs_metadata:', visirnum
3096 call error_handler(e_err, routine, string1, source, &
3097 revision, revdate, text2=string2)
3098end if
3099
3100sat_az = visir_obs_metadata(mykey) % sat_az
3101sat_ze = visir_obs_metadata(mykey) % sat_ze
3102sun_az = visir_obs_metadata(mykey) % sun_az
3103sun_ze = visir_obs_metadata(mykey) % sun_ze
3104platform_id = visir_obs_metadata(mykey) % platform_id
3105sat_id = visir_obs_metadata(mykey) % sat_id
3106sensor_id = visir_obs_metadata(mykey) % sensor_id
3107channel = visir_obs_metadata(mykey) % channel
3108specularity = visir_obs_metadata(mykey) % specularity
3109
3110end subroutine get_visir_metadata

3169!----------------------------------------------------------------------
3170! This routine reads the metadata for the visir/mw radiance/tb obs
3171subroutine read_rttov_metadata(key, obsID, ifile, fform)
3172integer, intent(out) :: key ! index into local metadata
3173integer, intent(in) :: obsid
3174integer, intent(in) :: ifile
3175character(len=*), intent(in), optional :: fform
3176
3177! temp variables
3178logical :: is_asciifile
3179integer :: ierr
3180character(len=5) :: header
3181integer :: oldkey
3182real(r8) :: sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze
3183integer :: platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3184real(r8) :: specularity
3185real(r8) :: mag_field, cosbk
3186real(r8) :: fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, &
3187 fastem_p4, fastem_p5
3188
3189logical :: is_visir
3190
3191if ( .not. module_initialized ) call initialize_module
3192
3193is_asciifile = ascii_file_format(fform)
3194
3195write(string2,*)'observation #',obsid
3196
3197if ( is_asciifile ) then
3198 read(ifile, *, iostat=ierr) header
3199 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','header',string2)
3200 if (trim(header) == trim(visir_string)) then
3201 ! Load the visible/IR data from the file
3202 read(ifile, *, iostat=ierr) sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze
3203 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','sat,sun az/ze',string2)
3204 read(ifile, *, iostat=ierr) platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3205 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','platform/sat_id/sensor/channel',string2)
3206 read(ifile, *, iostat=ierr) specularity
3207 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','specularity',string2)
3208 read(ifile, *, iostat=ierr) oldkey
3209 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','oldkey',string2)
3210 is_visir = .true.
3211 elseif (trim(header) == trim(mw_string)) then
3212 ! Load the visible/IR data from the file
3213 read(ifile, *, iostat=ierr) sat_az, sat_ze
3214 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','sat az/ze',string2)
3215 read(ifile, *, iostat=ierr) platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3216 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','platform/sat_id/sensor/channel',string2)
3217 read(ifile, *, iostat=ierr) mag_field, cosbk
3218 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','mag_field/cosbk',string2)
3219 read(ifile, *, iostat=ierr) fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, &
3220 fastem_p4, fastem_p5
3221 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','fastem_p1-5',string2)
3222 read(ifile, *, iostat=ierr) oldkey
3223 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','oldkey',string2)
3224 is_visir = .false.
3225 else
3226 write(string1,*)"Expected radiance header ["//visir_string//"] or ["//mw_string//"]" // &
3227 " in input file, got ["//header//"]"
3228 call error_handler(e_err, 'read_rttov_metadata', string1, source, revision, revdate, text2=string2)
3229 endif
3230else
3231 read(ifile, iostat=ierr) header
3232 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','header',string2)
3233
3234 if (trim(header) == trim(visir_string)) then
3235 ! Load the visible/IR data from the file
3236 read(ifile, iostat=ierr) sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze
3237 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','sat,sun az/ze',string2)
3238 read(ifile, iostat=ierr) platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3239 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','platform/sat_id/sensor/channel',string2)
3240 read(ifile, iostat=ierr) specularity
3241 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','platform/sat_id/sensor/channel',string2)
3242 read(ifile, iostat=ierr) oldkey
3243 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','oldkey',string2)
3244 is_visir = .true.
3245 elseif (trim(header) == trim(mw_string)) then
3246 ! Load the visible/IR data from the file
3247 read(ifile, iostat=ierr) sat_az, sat_ze
3248 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','sat az/ze',string2)
3249 read(ifile, iostat=ierr) platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3250 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','platform/sat_id/sensor/channel',string2)
3251 read(ifile, iostat=ierr) mag_field, cosbk
3252 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','mag_field/cosbk',string2)
3253 read(ifile, iostat=ierr) fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, &
3254 fastem_p4, fastem_p5
3255 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','fastem_p1-5',string2)
3256 read(ifile, iostat=ierr) oldkey
3257 call check_iostat(ierr,'read_rttov_metadata','oldkey',string2)
3258 is_visir = .false.
3259 else
3260 write(string1,*)"Expected radiance header ["//visir_string//"] or ["//mw_string//"]" // &
3261 " in input file, got ["//header//"]"
3262 call error_handler(e_err, 'read_rttov_metadata', string1, &
3263 source, revision, revdate, text2=string2)
3264 end if
3265endif
3266
3267! The oldkey is thrown away.
3268
3269! Store the metadata in module storage. The new key is returned.
3270if (is_visir) then
3271 call set_visir_metadata(key, sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze, &
3272 platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel, specularity)
3273else
3274 call set_mw_metadata(key, sat_az, sat_ze, platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, &
3275 channel, mag_field, cosbk, fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, &
3276 fastem_p4, fastem_p5)
3277end if
3278
3279end subroutine read_rttov_metadata
3280
3281
3282!----------------------------------------------------------------------
3283! writes the metadata for radiance observations.
3284
3285subroutine write_rttov_metadata(key, ifile, fform)
3286
3287integer, intent(in) :: key
3288integer, intent(in) :: ifile
3289character(len=*), intent(in), optional :: fform
3290
3291logical :: is_asciifile
3292real(r8) :: sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze
3293integer :: platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3294real(r8) :: specularity
3295real(r8) :: mag_field, cosbk
3296real(r8) :: fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, &
3297 fastem_p4, fastem_p5
3298
3299character(len=5) :: header
3300character(len=*), parameter :: routine = 'write_rttov_metadata'
3301
3302if ( .not. module_initialized ) call initialize_module
3303
3304! given the index into the local metadata arrays - retrieve
3305! the metadata for this particular observation.
3306
3307is_asciifile = ascii_file_format(fform)
3308
3309select case (obstype_metadata(subtype,key))
3310
3311 case (visir)
3312 call get_visir_metadata(key, sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze, &
3313 platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel, specularity)
3314
3315 header = visir_string
3316
3317 if (is_asciifile) then
3318 write(ifile, *) header
3319 write(ifile, *) sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze
3320 write(ifile, *) platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3321 write(ifile, *) specularity
3322 write(ifile, *) key
3323 else
3324 write(ifile ) header
3325 write(ifile ) sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze
3326 write(ifile ) platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3327 write(ifile ) specularity
3328 write(ifile ) key
3329 endif
3330 case (mw)
3331 call get_mw_metadata(key, sat_az, sat_ze, &
3332 platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel, mag_field, cosbk, &
3333 fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, fastem_p4, &
3334 fastem_p5)
3335
3336 header = mw_string
3337
3338 if (is_asciifile) then
3339 write(ifile, *) header
3340 write(ifile, *) sat_az, sat_ze
3341 write(ifile, *) platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3342 write(ifile, *) mag_field, cosbk
3343 write(ifile, *) fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, &
3344 fastem_p4, fastem_p5
3345 write(ifile, *) key
3346 else
3347 write(ifile ) header
3348 write(ifile ) sat_az, sat_ze
3349 write(ifile ) platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3350 write(ifile ) mag_field, cosbk
3351 write(ifile ) fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, &
3352 fastem_p4, fastem_p5
3353 write(ifile ) key
3354 end if
3355 case default
3356 call error_handler(e_err, routine, 'unknown metadata type', source, revision, revdate)
3357end select
3358
3359end subroutine write_rttov_metadata
3360
3361
3362!----------------------------------------------------------------------
3363subroutine interactive_rttov_metadata(key)
3364integer, intent(out) :: key
3365
3366real(r8) :: sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze
3367integer :: platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3368real(r8) :: specularity
3369real(r8) :: mag_field, cosbk
3370real(r8) :: fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, &
3371 fastem_p4, fastem_p5
3372
3373integer :: visir_int
3374logical :: is_visir
3375
3376if ( .not. module_initialized ) call initialize_module
3377
3378! Prompt for input for the required metadata
3379visir_int = interactive_i('freq type Visible/IR or MW observation? [1 = vis/ir, 0 = microwave]', minvalue=0, maxvalue=1)
3380
3381if (visir_int == 0) then
3382 is_visir = .false.
3383else
3384 is_visir = .true.
3385end if
3386
3387sat_az = interactive_r('sat_az satellite azimuth [degrees]', minvalue = 0.0_r8, maxvalue = 360.0_r8)
3388sat_ze = interactive_r('sat_ze satellite zenith [degrees]', minvalue = 0.0_r8, maxvalue = 90.0_r8)
3389if (is_visir .and. addsolar) then
3390 sun_az = interactive_r('sun_az solar azimuth [degrees]', minvalue = 0.0_r8, maxvalue = 360.0_r8)
3391 sun_ze = interactive_r('sun_ze solar zenith [degrees]', minvalue = 0.0_r8, maxvalue = 90.0_r8)
3392else
3393 sun_az = missing_r8
3394 sun_ze = missing_r8
3395end if
3396
3397platform_id = interactive_i('platform id RTTOV Platform number [see docs]', minvalue = 1)
3398sat_id = interactive_i('satellite id RTTOV Satellite ID number [see docs]', minvalue = 0)
3399sensor_id = interactive_i('sensor id RTTOV Sensor number [see docs]', minvalue = 1)
3400channel = interactive_i('channel Instrument channel number [see docs]', minvalue = 1)
3401
3402if (is_visir .and. do_lambertian) then
3403 specularity = interactive_r('specularity (0-1)', minvalue = 0.0_r8, maxvalue = 1.0_r8)
3404else
3405 specularity = missing_r8
3406end if
3407
3408if (.not. is_visir .and. use_zeeman) then
3409 mag_field = interactive_r('magnetic fld Earth magnetic field strength (Gauss)', minvalue = 0.2_r8, maxvalue = 0.7_r8)
3410 cosbk = interactive_r('cosbk Cosine of angle between magnetic field and viewing angle', minvalue = -1.0_r8, maxvalue = 1.0_r8)
3411else
3412 mag_field = missing_r8
3413 cosbk = missing_r8
3414end if
3415
3416if (.not. is_visir) then
3417 fastem_p1 = interactive_r('fastem land1 1st fastem land/sea ice parameter', minvalue = 0.0_r8)
3418 fastem_p2 = interactive_r('fastem land2 2nd fastem land/sea ice parameter', minvalue = 0.0_r8)
3419 fastem_p3 = interactive_r('fastem land3 3rd fastem land/sea ice parameter', minvalue = 0.0_r8)
3420 fastem_p4 = interactive_r('fastem land4 4th fastem land/sea ice parameter', minvalue = 0.0_r8)
3421 fastem_p5 = interactive_r('fastem land5 5th fastem land/sea ice parameter', minvalue = 0.0_r8)
3422else
3423 fastem_p1 = missing_r8
3424 fastem_p2 = missing_r8
3425 fastem_p3 = missing_r8
3426 fastem_p4 = missing_r8
3427 fastem_p5 = missing_r8
3428end if
3429
3430if (is_visir) then
3431 call set_visir_metadata(key, sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze, &
3432 platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel, specularity)
3433else
3434 call set_mw_metadata(key, sat_az, sat_ze, platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, &
3435 channel, mag_field, cosbk, fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, &
3436 fastem_p4, fastem_p5)
3437end if
3438
3439end subroutine interactive_rttov_metadata
3440
3441
3442!----------------------------------------------------------------------
3443subroutine get_expected_radiance(obs_kind_ind, state_handle, ens_size, location, key, flavor, val, istatus)
3444
3445integer, intent(in) :: obs_kind_ind
3446type(ensemble_type), intent(in) :: state_handle
3447integer, intent(in) :: ens_size
3448type(location_type), intent(in) :: location ! location of obs
3449integer, intent(in) :: key ! key into module metadata
3450integer, intent(in) :: flavor ! flavor of obs
3451real(r8), intent(out) :: val(ens_size) ! value of obs
3452integer, intent(out) :: istatus(ens_size) ! status of the calculation
3453
3454integer :: platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel
3455integer :: instrument(3)
3456
3457integer :: this_istatus(ens_size)
3458
3459integer :: i
3460real(r8) :: loc_array(3)
3461real(r8) :: loc_lon, loc_lat
3462real(r8) :: loc_value(ens_size)
3463type(location_type) :: loc
3464integer :: maxlevels, numlevels
3465
3466type(location_type) :: loc_undef ! surface location
3467type(location_type) :: loc_sea ! surface location
3468type(location_type) :: loc_sfc ! surface location
3469type(location_type) :: loc_2m ! surface location
3470type(location_type) :: loc_10m ! surface location
3471
3472type(rttov_sensor_type), pointer :: sensor
3473
3474character(len=*), parameter :: routine = 'get_expected_radiance'
3475
3476type(visir_metadata_type), pointer :: visir_md
3477type(mw_metadata_type), pointer :: mw_md
3478
3479logical :: return_now
3480
3481!=================================================================================
3482
3483if ( .not. module_initialized ) call initialize_module
3484
3485val = 0.0_r8 ! set return value early
3486
3487! Make sure the desired key is within the useful length of the metadata arrays.
3488call key_within_range(key, routine)
3489
3490select case (obstype_metadata(subtype, key))
3491
3492case (visir)
3493 visir_md => visir_obs_metadata(obstype_metadata(subkey,key))
3494 mw_md => null()
3495
3496 platform_id = visir_md % platform_id
3497 sat_id = visir_md % sat_id
3498 sensor_id = visir_md % sensor_id
3499 channel = visir_md % channel
3500case (mw)
3501 visir_md => null()
3502 mw_md => mw_obs_metadata(obstype_metadata(subkey,key))
3503
3504 platform_id = mw_md % platform_id
3505 sat_id = mw_md % sat_id
3506 sensor_id = mw_md % sensor_id
3507 channel = mw_md % channel
3508case default
3509 call error_handler(e_err, routine, 'unknown metadata type', source, revision, revdate)
3510end select
3511
3512!=================================================================================
3513! Determine the number of model levels
3514! using only the standard DART interfaces to model
3515!=================================================================================
3516
3517loc_array = get_location(location) ! loc is in DEGREES
3518loc_lon = loc_array(1)
3519loc_lat = loc_array(2)
3520
3521! if necessary, preallocate the column arrays
3522if ( .not. arrays_prealloced) then
3523 numlevels = 0
3524
3525 maxlevels = 10000 ! something larger than we think will exist
3526 countlevels : do i = 1,maxlevels
3527 loc = set_location(loc_lon, loc_lat, real(i,r8), vertislevel)
3528 call interpolate(state_handle, ens_size, loc, qty_pressure, loc_value, this_istatus)
3529 if ( any(this_istatus /= 0 ) ) exit countlevels
3530 numlevels = numlevels + 1
3531 enddo countlevels
3532
3533 if ((numlevels == maxlevels) .or. (numlevels == 0)) then
3534 write(string1,'(A,I0)') 'FAILED to determine number of levels in model:', &
3535 numlevels
3536
3537 if (debug) call error_handler(e_allmsg,routine,string1,source,revision,revdate)
3538 istatus = 1
3539 val = missing_r8
3540 return
3541 else
3542 if (debug) write(*,*) routine // ' we have ',numlevels,' model levels'
3543 endif
3544
3545 ! allocate the necessary fields
3546 call atmos_profile_setup(atmos, ens_size, numlevels, use_q2m, &
3547 use_uv10m, use_wfetch, use_water_type, use_salinity, &
3548 supply_foam_fraction, use_sfc_snow_frac)
3549
3550 call trace_gas_profile_setup(trace_gas, ens_size, numlevels, &
3551 ozone_data, co2_data, n2o_data, ch4_data, co_data, so2_data)
3552
3553 if (add_aerosl) then
3554 call aerosol_profile_setup(aerosols, ens_size, numlevels, &
3555 aerosl_type)
3556 end if
3557
3558 call cloud_profile_setup(clouds, ens_size, numlevels, &
3559 cfrac_data, clw_data, clw_scheme, rain_data, ciw_data, &
3560 ice_scheme, use_icede, snow_data, graupel_data, &
3561 hail_data, w_data, htfrtc_simple_cloud)
3562
3563 arrays_prealloced = .true.
3564else
3565 ! load the number of levels from the temperature array, assumed to have been initialized
3566 numlevels = size(atmos%temperature,2)
3567end if
3568
3569instrument(1) = platform_id
3570instrument(2) = sat_id
3571instrument(3) = sensor_id
3572
3573! also check if the sensor runtime needs to be initialized
3574sensor => get_rttov_sensor(instrument)
3575
3576if (.not. associated(sensor)) then
3577 write(string1,*)'Could not find the platform/sat/sensor id combination:',&
3578 platform_id,sat_id,sensor_id
3579 call error_handler(e_err, routine, string1, source, revision, revdate)
3580end if
3581
3582if (.not. associated(sensor%runtime)) then
3583 call initialize_rttov_sensor_runtime(sensor,ens_size,numlevels)
3584end if
3585
3586! Set all of the istatuses back to zero for track_status
3587istatus = 0
3588
3589getleveldata : do i = 1,numlevels
3590 loc = set_location(loc_lon, loc_lat, real(i,r8), vertislevel)
3591
3592 call interpolate(state_handle, ens_size, loc, qty_pressure, atmos%pressure(:,i), this_istatus)
3593 call check_status('QTY_PRESSURE', ens_size, this_istatus, val, loc, istatus, routine, source, revision, revdate, .true., return_now)
3594 if (return_now) return
3595
3596 call interpolate(state_handle, ens_size, loc, qty_temperature, atmos%temperature(:, i), this_istatus)
3597 call check_status('QTY_TEMPERATURE', ens_size, this_istatus, val, loc, istatus, routine, source, revision, revdate, .true., return_now)
3598 if (return_now) return
3599
3600 call interpolate(state_handle, ens_size, loc, qty_vapor_mixing_ratio, atmos%moisture(:, i), this_istatus)
3601 call check_status('QTY_VAPOR_MIXING_RATIO', ens_size, this_istatus, val, loc, istatus, routine, source, revision, revdate, .true., return_now)
3602 if (return_now) return
3603
3604 if (ozone_data) then
3605 call interpolate(state_handle, ens_size, loc, qty_o3, trace_gas%ozone(:, i), this_istatus)
3606 call check_status('QTY_O3', ens_size, this_istatus, val, loc, istatus, routine, source, revision, revdate, .false., return_now)
3607 if (return_now) return
3608 end if
3609
3610 if (co2_data) then
3611 call interpolate(state_handle, ens_size, loc, qty_co2, trace_gas%co2(:, i), this_istatus)
3612 call check_status('QTY_CO2', ens_size, this_istatus, val, loc, istatus, routine, source, revision, revdate, .false., return_now)
3613 if (return_now) return
3614 end if
3615
3616 if (n2o_data) then
3617 call interpolate(state_handle, ens_size, loc, qty_n2o, trace_gas%n2o(:, i), this_istatus)
3618 call check_status('QTY_N2O', ens_size, this_istatus, val, loc, istatus, routine, source, revision, revdate, .false., return_now)
3619 if (return_now) return
3620 end if

3625 if (return_now) return

3631 if (return_now) return
3632 end if

3634 if (so2_data) then

3636 call check_status('QTY_SO2', ens_size, this_istatus, val, loc, istatus, routine, source, revision, revdate, .false., return_now)
3637 if (return_now) return
3638 end if
3639
3640 if (add_aerosl) then
3641 if (aerosl_type == 1) then

3805
3806! Set the surface fields
3807! Some models check that the difference between 'surface' locations and
3808! the surface of the model is within some namelist-specified tolerance.
3809! To ensure that these interpolations return useful values, get the model
3810! definiiton of the surface and add the appropriate height, if any.
3811
3812! Simply check if we can get the model surface elevation (loc_sea is not used)
3813loc_sea = set_location(loc_lon, loc_lat, 0.0_r8, vertissurface )
3814call interpolate(state_handle, ens_size, loc_sea, qty_surface_elevation, atmos%sfc_elev(:), this_istatus)
3815call check_status('QTY_SURFACE_ELEVATION', ens_size, this_istatus, val, loc_sea, istatus, routine, source, revision, revdate, .true., return_now)
3816if (return_now) return

3819!> should we continue ...
3820

3825loc_10m = set_location(loc_lon, loc_lat, 10.0_r8+atmos%sfc_elev(1), vertissurface )

3833if (return_now) return

3896 if (return_now) return
3897
3898 call interpolate(state_handle, ens_size, loc_undef, qty_cloud_top_pressure, clouds%ctp(:), this_istatus)
3899 call check_status('QTY_CLOUD_TOP_PRESSURE', ens_size, this_istatus, val, loc_undef, istatus, routine, source, revision, revdate, .false., return_now)
3900 if (return_now) return
3901end if
3902
3903if (debug) then
3904 print*, 'interpolate pressure = ', atmos%pressure(1,1), '...', atmos%pressure(1,numlevels)
3905 print*, 'interpolate temperature = ', atmos%temperature(1,1), '...', atmos%temperature(1,numlevels)
3906 print*, 'interpolate moisture = ', atmos%moisture(1,1), '...', atmos%moisture(1,numlevels)
3907end if
3908
3909call do_forward_model(ens_size=ens_size, &
3910 nlevels=numlevels, &
3911 flavor=flavor, &
3912 location=location, &
3913 atmos=atmos, &
3914 trace_gas=trace_gas, &
3915 clouds=clouds, &
3916 aerosols=aerosols, &
3917 sensor=sensor, &
3918 channel=channel, &
3919 first_lvl_is_sfc=first_lvl_is_sfc, &
3920 mw_clear_sky_only=mw_clear_sky_only, &
3921 clw_scheme=clw_scheme, &
3922 ice_scheme=ice_scheme, &
3923 idg_scheme=idg_scheme, &
3924 aerosl_type=aerosl_type, &
3925 do_lambertian=do_lambertian, &
3926 use_totalice=use_totalice, &
3927 use_zeeman=use_zeeman, &
3928 radiances=val, &
3929 error_status=this_istatus, &
3930 visir_md=visir_md, &
3931 mw_md=mw_md)
3932
3933! copy the status from this_istatus to istatus, set missing if error
3934call track_status(ens_size, this_istatus, val, istatus, return_now)
3935
3936if (debug) then
3937 print*, 'istatus = ', istatus
3938 print*, 'radiance = ', val
3939end if
3940
3941end subroutine get_expected_radiance
3942

3967

3969character(len=*), intent(in) :: routine
3970

3972 ! we are still within limits
3973 return
3974else

3982!----------------------------------------------------------------------

3985

3992!-----------------------------------------------------------------------
3993! Make sure the subkey is within the useful range of the metadata arrays
3994function is_valid_subkey(skey, stype)
3995
3996integer, intent(in) :: skey ! subkey
3997integer, intent(in) :: stype ! subype (visir or mw)
3998logical :: is_valid_subkey
3999
4000if (skey <=0 ) then
4001 is_valid_subkey = .false.
4002 return
4003endif
4004
4005select case (stype)
4006case (visir)
4007 is_valid_subkey = (skey <= visirnum)
4008case (mw)
4009 is_valid_subkey = (skey <= mwnum)
4010case default
4011 is_valid_subkey = .false.
4012end select
4013
4014end function is_valid_subkey

4016!----------------------------------------------------------------------
4017! If the allocatable metadata arrays are not big enough ... try again
4018
4019subroutine grow_metadata(key, routine, obstype)
4020
4021integer, intent(in) :: key
4022character(len=*), intent(in) :: routine
4023integer, intent(in) :: obstype
4024
4025integer :: orglength, newlength
4026type(visir_metadata_type), allocatable :: safe_visir_metadata(:)
4027type(mw_metadata_type), allocatable :: safe_mw_metadata(:)
4028integer, allocatable :: safe_obstype_metadata(:,:)
4029
4030! Check for some error conditions.
4031if (key < 1) then
4032 write(string1, *) 'key (',key,') must be >= 1'
4033 call error_handler(e_err,routine,string1,source,revision,revdate)
4034elseif (key > 2*size(obstype_metadata(1,:))) then
4035 write(string1, *) 'key (',key,') really unexpected.'
4036 write(string2, *) 'doubling storage will not help.'
4037 call error_handler(e_err,routine,string1,source,revision,revdate, &
4038 text2=string2)
4039endif
4040
4041select case (obstype)
4042 case (visir)
4043 if (visirnum > size(visir_obs_metadata)) then
4044 ! we need to grow visir_obs_metadata
4045 orglength = size(visir_obs_metadata)
4046 newlength = 2 * orglength
4047
4048 ! News. Tell the user we are increasing storage.
4049 write(string1, *) 'Warning: subkey (',visirnum,') exceeds visir_obs_metadata length (',orglength,')'
4050 write(string2, *) 'Increasing visir_obs_metadata to length ',newlength
4051 call error_handler(e_msg,routine,string1,source,revision,revdate,text2=string2)
4052
4053 allocate(safe_visir_metadata(orglength))
4054 safe_visir_metadata(:) = visir_obs_metadata(:)
4055
4056 deallocate(visir_obs_metadata)
4057 allocate(visir_obs_metadata(newlength))
4058
4059 visir_obs_metadata = missing_visir_metadata
4060 visir_obs_metadata(1:orglength) = safe_visir_metadata(:)
4061 deallocate(safe_visir_metadata)
4062 endif
4063 case (mw)
4064 ! duplicate the above since we can't use any object-oriented magic
4065 if (mwnum > size(mw_obs_metadata)) then
4066 ! we need to grow mw_obs_metadata
4067 orglength = size(mw_obs_metadata)
4068 newlength = 2 * orglength
4069
4070 ! News. Tell the user we are increasing storage.
4071 write(string1, *) 'Warning: subkey (',mwnum,') exceeds mw_obs_metadata length (',orglength,')'
4072 write(string2, *) 'Increasing mw_obs_metadata to length ',newlength
4073 call error_handler(e_msg,routine,string1,source,revision,revdate,text2=string2)
4074
4075 allocate(safe_mw_metadata(orglength))
4076 safe_mw_metadata(:) = mw_obs_metadata(:)
4077
4078 deallocate(mw_obs_metadata)
4079 allocate(mw_obs_metadata(newlength))
4080
4081 mw_obs_metadata = missing_mw_metadata
4082 mw_obs_metadata(1:orglength) = safe_mw_metadata(:)
4083 deallocate(safe_mw_metadata)
4084 end if
4085 case default
4086 call error_handler(e_err, routine, 'unknown metadata type', source, revision, revdate)
4087end select
4088
4089
4090if ( key > size(obstype_metadata(1,:)) ) then
4091 ! we need to grow obstype_metadata
4092 orglength = size(obstype_metadata(1,:))
4093 newlength = 2 * orglength
4094
4095 ! News. Tell the user we are increasing storage.
4096 write(string1, *) 'Warning: key (',key,') exceeds obs_metadata length (',orglength,')'
4097 write(string2, *) 'Increasing obs_metadata to length ',newlength
4098 call error_handler(e_msg,routine,string1,source,revision,revdate,text2=string2)
4099
4100 allocate(safe_obstype_metadata(2,orglength))
4101 safe_obstype_metadata(:,:) = obstype_metadata(:,:)
4102 deallocate(obstype_metadata)
4103 allocate(obstype_metadata(2, newlength))
4104
4105 obstype_metadata(:,:) = no_obs
4106 obstype_metadata(:,1:orglength) = safe_obstype_metadata(:,1:orglength)
4107 deallocate(safe_obstype_metadata)
4108endif
4109
4110end subroutine grow_metadata
4111
4112!----------------------------------------------------------------------
4113!> override track_status behavior to always error and print an error message if the field
4114!> cannot be found
4115
4116subroutine check_status(field_name, ens_size, this_istatus, val, loc, istatus, &
4117 routine, source, revision, revdate, required, return_now)
4118
4119character(len=*), intent(in) :: field_name
4120integer, intent(in) :: ens_size
4121integer, intent(in) :: this_istatus(ens_size)
4122real(r8), intent(out) :: val(ens_size)
4123type(location_type), intent(in) :: loc
4124integer, intent(out) :: istatus(ens_size) ! status of the calculation
4125character(len=*), intent(in) :: routine
4126character(len=*), intent(in) :: source
4127character(len=*), intent(in) :: revision
4128character(len=*), intent(in) :: revdate
4129logical, intent(in) :: required
4130logical, intent(out) :: return_now
4131
4132real(r8) :: locv(3)
4133
4134call track_status(ens_size, this_istatus, val, istatus, return_now)
4135
4136if (return_now) then
4137 locv = get_location(loc)
4138 if (required) then
4139 write(string1,*) 'Could not find required field ' // trim(field_name), ' istatus:',istatus,&
4140 'location:',locv(1),'/',locv(2),'/',locv(3)
4141 call error_handler(e_warn,routine,string1,source,revision,revdate)
4142 else if (debug) then
4143 write(string1,*) 'Could not find requested field ' // trim(field_name), ' istatus:',istatus,&
4144 'location:',locv(1),'/',locv(2),'/',locv(3)
4145 call error_handler(e_allmsg,routine,string1,source,revision,revdate)
4146 end if
4147end if
4148
4149end subroutine check_status

4279!-----------------------------------------------------------------------
4280! A function to return the key associated with a VISIR/MW metadata.
4281! Note that this function (and the module storage of VISIR/MW metadata)
4282! should be rethought to allow for the notion of a "channel" to
4283! live more harmoniously with other types of observations.
4284!
4285! FIXME: reintegrate radiance_obs_seq_to_netcdf and obs_seq_to_netcdf
4286
4287function get_channel(flavor, key) result(channel)
4288
4289 integer, intent(in) :: flavor
4290 integer, intent(in) :: key
4291 integer :: channel
4292
4293 real(r8) :: sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze
4294 integer :: platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id
4295 real(r8) :: mag_field, cosbk, specularity
4296 real(r8) :: fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, fastem_p4, fastem_p5
4297
4298 character(len=*), parameter :: routine = 'get_channel'
4299 channel = missing_r8
4300
4301 ! If the observation is not supported by this module, there is no channel
4302 ! This is delicate in that all types supported by this module are consecutively
4303 ! numbered. If new types are added, this will need to change.
4304 if (flavor < noaa_1_vtpr1_radiance .or. flavor > cloudsat_1_cpr_tb) return
4305
4306 ! Retrieve channel from different metadata types
4307 ! All the other arguments are mandatory, but not needed here.
4308
4309 select case (obstype_metadata(subtype,key))
4310
4311 case ( visir )
4312 call get_visir_metadata(key, &
4313 sat_az, sat_ze, sun_az, sun_ze, &
4314 platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel, &
4315 specularity)
4316 case ( mw )
4317 call get_mw_metadata(key, &
4318 sat_az, sat_ze, &
4319 platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel, &
4320 mag_field, cosbk, &
4321 fastem_p1, fastem_p2, fastem_p3, fastem_p4, fastem_p5)
4322 case default
4323 call error_handler(e_err, routine, 'unknown metadata type', source, revision, revdate)
4324 end select
4325
4326 if (debug) write(*,*)'get_channel: key,channel ',key,channel
4327
4328end function get_channel

4374! The actul data in the obs is junk
4375function test_set_metadata(n_ir, n_mw) result(metadata_size)
4376

4379

4382integer :: platform_id, sat_id, sensor_id, channel

4398 fastem_p4, fastem_p5)
4399enddo
4400
4401metadata_size(1) = size(obstype_metadata,2)
4402metadata_size(2) = size(visir_obs_metadata)
4403metadata_size(3) = size(mw_obs_metadata)
